<template>
  <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="name"
      :counter="10"
      :rules="nameRules"
      label="Name"
      required
    ></v-text-field>

    <v-btn color="error" class="mr-4" @click="reset">
      Reset Form
    </v-btn>

    <v-btn color="warning" @click="resetValidation">
      Reset Validation
    </v-btn>
  </v-form>
</template>

export default {
